EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Downloading. Now Let's Party.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=header> ACTIVATE YOUR LICENSE & OWN YOUR ENVIRONMENT
Get Activation Key: <http://bit.ly/1o95lOP>
You've just downloaded the world's most advanced virtualization management software, VMTurbo Operations Manager. You're on your way to ramping-up VM density and achieving previously impossible utilization rates, all while assuring application performance like never before. Think your environment is too complex? VMTurbo thrives on complexity.
- Start by deploying the self-contained instance. Your username and password is "administrator". Our Installation Video <http://bit.ly/1kawumm> will usher you straight to the promised land.
- Snag your License Key <http://bit.ly/1o95lOP>, or as we like to call it, the “Life before VMTurbo was so much worse” key.
Life is about the change. CapEx and OpEx are going down, along with your frustrations. Like we said, you’re a genius. It’s time to own your environment.
Looking forward to your success, VMTurbo 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
